title: card.wireless.penalty Request Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Configure wireless connection penalties and timeouts for network operations on the Notecard.

seconds.description: The penalty timeout in seconds applied to failed wireless connections before retrying. Set to 0 to disable penalty timeouts.

max.description: Maximum number of penalty timeouts to apply before giving up on a connection attempt. Set to 0 for unlimited retries.

multiplier.description: Multiplier applied to penalty timeout on each successive failure. For example, 2.0 would double the timeout each time.

samples.description: Set penalty timeout to 5 minutes with exponential backoff.

annotations.title: note
annotations.description: Penalty configurations help manage network resources by introducing delays after failed connection attempts, preventing rapid retry loops that could impact battery life and network performance.
